line.text:
Service Change  Posted: 12/27/2012  5:50AM

No [3] trains between 96 St and 148 St.

[2] trains and free shuttle buses provide alternate service

[3] trains operate between New Lots Av and 96 St, and via the [1] to 137 St.

[2] trains make all [3] stops between 96 St and 135 St.

Free shuttle buses provide alternate service between 135 St and 148 St.

  • Transfer between [2] and [3] trains at 96 St.
  • Transfer between [2] trains and shuttle buses at 135 St.

Note: This change is necessary to prepare for forecasted inclement weather conditions.

Please check mta.info for the most current information.

Reminder: Late night [3] service does not operate between Times Sq-42 St and New Lots Av.



Service Change  Posted: 12/27/2012 12:35AM

All times until further notice:

No [1] trains between Rector St and South Ferry

[1] service operates between 242 St and Rector St.

For South Ferry, use the nearby Whitehall St [R]* or Bowling Green [4], [5] Stations instead.

 - Transfer between [1] and [R] trains at Times Sq-42 St.

 - Transfer between [1] and [2] [3] trains at Chambers St.

 - Transfer between [2] [3] and [4] [5] trains at Fulton St.

*Late night service at this station is provided by the [N].

line.name: ACE
line.text:
Service Change  Posted: 12/27/2012  7:42AM

[A] Shuttle bus service detoured due to flooding on Rockaway Turnpike.

Detour as follows:

Southbound to Mott Av [A]: Via Rockaway Turnpike, right on Burnside Av, left into 878  and then regular route.

Northbound to Howard Beach [A]: Via 878, right on Peninsula Blvd, left on Rockaway Turnpike and then regular route.

Please allow additional travel time.

 



Service Change  Posted: 12/27/2012 12:34AM

Until further notice:

[A] No trains between Howard Beach-JFK/Broad Channel and the Rockaways.

[A] Service operates between 207 St and Lefferts Blvd/Howard Beach.

Free shuttle buses operate nonstop between Howard Beach [A] and Mott Av.

[H] Free shuttle trains operate between Mott Av and Beach 90 St. 

[H] Shuttle hours of operation:

Departing Mott Av: 4am to 12 midnight, every 15 minutes.

Departing Beach 90 St: 4:30am to 12:30am, every 15 minutes.

-Transfer between [A] trains and shuttle buses at Howard Beach.

-Transfer between shuttle buses and [H] trains at Mott Av.

For service between Beach 90 St and Beach 116 St, take the Q22 bus,

making nearby stops on Rockaway Beach Blvd.

line.name: B1 - B83
line.text:
Service Change  Posted: 12/27/2012 12:32AM

B36 bus detoured due to Con Ed work on Mermaid Av and W 33 St. 

Detour as follows:

Eastbound: Via W 33 St, right on Mermaid Av, left on 36 St, left on Surf Av and then regular route.

Please allow additional travel time.

line.name: BX1 - BX55
line.text:
Service Change  Posted: 12/27/2012  7:16AM

Bx31 and BxM10 buses are detoured due to milling on Eastchester Rd between Givan Av and Hammersley Av.

Detour as follows:

Southbound: Burke Av stop; buses will pick up near side of Givan Av; Gun Hill Av stop, buses will pick up on far side of Gun Hill Rd (by park).

Northbound: Burke Av stop; drop off on Givan Av after left turn. 

Please allow additional travel time. 

 

 



Planned Detour
Bx4, Bx4A and Bx31 buses detoured due to Side Walk Reconstruction

All times

Buses are being detoured from Lane Av between E Tremont
and Benson Avs.

Northbound/Southbound: Customers are advised to board
on Lane Av at Benson Av.

• Please allow additional travel time.




Planned Detour
Bx28 and Bx30 buses bypassing stop due to construction

All times

Buses are bypassing the Gun Hill Rd at Bronxwood Av bus stop.

Eastbound/Westbound: Customers are advised to use the
temporary bus stop on Gun Hill Rd at Colden Av.

• Please allow additional travel time.

line.name: BXM1 - BXM18
line.text:
Service Change  Posted: 12/27/2012  7:16AM

Bx31 and BxM10 buses are detoured due to milling on Eastchester Rd between Givan Av and Hammersley Av.

Detour as follows:

Southbound: Burke Av stop; buses will pick up near side of Givan Av; Gun Hill Av stop, buses will pick up on far side of Gun Hill Rd (by park).

Northbound: Burke Av stop; drop off on Givan Av after left turn. 

Please allow additional travel time.

line.name: M1 - M116
line.text:
Planned Detour
M5 and M5LTD and M7 bus stop change due to Holiday Events

All times until Saturday, Jan 5, 2013

Buses will not stop on 6 Av at 49 or 50 Sts.

M5, M5LTD and M7: Customers are advised to
use the bus stop on 47 St for limited service and
51 St for local service.

• Please allow additional travel time.




Planned Detour
M20 and M22 bus stop change due to Construction

All times

Temporary bus stop change due to construction.

M20 Southbound: Buses will bypass the Chambers St
at West Broadway stop.

M22 Westbound: Buses will bypass stops on Chambers
St at Church St and West Broadway.

Buses will make stops on West Broadway between Reade
and Chambers Sts.

• Please allow additional travel time.




Planned Detour
M2, M2LTD, M3, M5 and M5LTD bus stop change due to Holiday Events

All times until Saturday, Jan 5, 2013

Buses will not stop on 5 or 6 Avs at 49 or 50 Sts.

M2, M2LTD, M3, M5, M5LTD: Customers are advised
to use the bus stop on 53 St for limited service and 47
St for local service.

• Please allow additional travel time.




Planned Detour
M15 temporary bus stop change

All times

Bus stops on State St, far side of Whitehall St and Water St, far
side of Broad St are temporarily closed.

Northbound:
For the State St at Whitehall St bus stop, customers are advised
to board at the South Ferry Terminal.

For the Water St at Broad St bus stop, customers are advised to
board at Old Slip.

• Please allow additional travel time.




Planned Detour
M1, M1LTD, M4, M4LTD and Q32 bus stop change due to Holiday Events

All times until Saturday, Jan 5, 2013

Buses will not stop on 5 or 6 Avs at 49 or 50 Sts.

M1, M1LTD, M4, M4LTD and Q32: Customers are
advised to use the bus stop on 52 St for limited service
and 46 St for local service.

• Please allow additional travel time.

line.name: Q1 - Q113
line.text:
Service Change  Posted: 12/27/2012  8:05AM

Q113 bus detoured in both directions due to flooding on Brookville Blvd.

Detour as follows:

South to Seagrit Blvd:Via Guy R Brewer, left on Rockaway Blvd, right on Burnside Av, and then regular route.

North to Parsons Blvd: Via Rockaway Blvd, right on Guy R Brewer and then regular route. 

Please allow additional travel time. 



Service Change  Posted: 12/27/2012  7:56AM

Q11 bus service into Howard and Hamilton Beach will terminate at 159 Av and 101 St, due to flooding from extremely high tides.

Leaving Howard and Hamilton Beach buses will terminate at 159 Av and 101 St, make left turn onto 159 Av and then regular route. 

Please allow additional travel time. 



Service Change  Posted: 12/27/2012  6:17AM

Q113 limited bus detoured in both directions due to flooding on Rockaway Turnpike.

Detour as follows:

Southbound to Seagrit Blvd: Via Rockaway Turnpike, right on Burnside Av, left into 878  and then regular route.

Northbound to Parsons and Hillside Av: Via 878, right on Peninsula Blvd, left on Rockaway Turnpike and then regular route.

Please allow additional travel time.



Planned Detour
M1, M1LTD, M4, M4LTD and Q32 bus stop change due to Holiday Events

All times until Saturday, Jan 5, 2013

Buses will not stop on 5 or 6 Avs at 49 or 50 Sts.

M1, M1LTD, M4, M4LTD and Q32: Customers are
advised to use the bus stop on 52 St for limited service
and 46 St for local service.

• Please allow additional travel time.

line.name: QM1 - QM25
line.text:
Planned Detour
QM1, QM5 and QM6 bus stop change due to Holiday Events

All times until Saturday, Jan 5, 2013

Buses will not stop on 6 Av at 49 St.

QM1, QM5 and QM6: Customers are advised to
use the bus stop on 6 Av at 48 St.

• Please allow additional travel time.

line.name: x1 - x68
line.text:
Planned Detour
X1, X7 and X9 bus stop change due to Holiday Events

All times until Saturday, Jan 5, 2013

Buses will not stop on 50 St at Rockefeller Plz or on
5 Av at 48 St.

X1, X7 and X9: Customers are advised to use the
bus stop on 7 Av at 50 St.

• Please allow additional travel time.

line.name: Oyster Bay
line.text:
Oyster Bay Branch Customers

 

Service is restored on the Oyster Bay Branch.  Earlier, a tree across the tracks west of Locust Valley suspended service.  The first train to operate west is the scheduled 7:13 AM train from Oyster Bay due Long Island City at 8:34 AM, running 16 minutes late.

 

The 8:06AM train from Jamaica due Oyster Bay at 9:03AM, is anticipated to operate approximately 30 minutes late as a residual delay of the earlier Oyster Bay Branch service suspension.

line.name: Pascack Valley
line.text:
Most regular weekday service resumes on the Port Jervis & Pascack Valley Lines beginning on Monday, Nov. 19. See www.njtransit.com for all train times.

Advisory from NJ Transit Alert
Dec 27, 2012 07:58:54 AM
System wide cross-honoring is in effect for NJ TRANSIT's bus, rail and light rail passes/tickets from Wednesday, December 26 at 1 p.m. until the end of service day Thursday, December 27 due to expected winter weather conditions.

line.name: Port Jervis
line.text:
Most regular weekday service resumes on the Port Jervis & Pascack Valley Lines beginning on Monday, Nov. 19. See www.njtransit.com for all train times.

Advisory from NJ Transit Alert
Dec 27, 2012 07:58:54 AM
System wide cross-honoring is in effect for NJ TRANSIT's bus, rail and light rail passes/tickets from Wednesday, December 26 at 1 p.m. until the end of service day Thursday, December 27 due to expected winter weather conditions.
